Order.description: An internal document generated by the seller, indicating that the customer is now ready to purchase products and services

orderCurrency.description: Specify currency for all order value amounts

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Display name for the sales order

orderNumber.description: Unique number assigned to the sales order and displayed to end users

salesOrderType.description: Type of sales order, such as change, renewal, or amendment

salesOrderStatus.description: Status of the sales order, such as Draft or Activated

salesOrderConfirmationStatus.description: What stage of customer approval and finalization has been achieved

salesOrderSystemStatus.description: Fixed order status codes so standard logic can use them

purchaseOrderNumber.description: Number identifying the original purchase order

purchaseOrderDate.description: Date of the original purchase order

orderStartDate.description: Date at which the order becomes effective, such as the beginning of a subscription period

orderEndDate.description: Date at which the order ends, such as the end of a subscription period

promiseDate.description: Date the order was promised to be fulfilled

salesChannel.description: Sales channel used to place the order

sellerId.description: References the party that plays the role of seller on the sales order

originalOrderId.description: Reference to the a parent order, such as for reship, exchange, or swap orders

soldToCustomerId.description: References customer who is the buyer, when that is different than the bill-to for the sales order

billToCustomerId.description: References the customer account that will be billed for the sales order

name.description: Optional display name for the address

addressLine1.description: The first address line can be used by itself for unstructured addresses

addressLine2.description: Optional second line of the address

addressLine3.description: Optional third line of the address

cityName.description: Display name of the city for the address

stateProvinceName.description: Display name of the state or province for the address

stateProvinceCode.description: The ISO region code for the address

countryName.description: Display name of the country for the address

countryCode.description: The ISO country code for the address

postalCodeText.description: The postal code for the address

geoAccuracyCode.description: Provides more information about the latitude and longitude of the address

billToEmailAddress.description: Customer email address associated to the sales order

billToPhoneNumber.description: Customer phone number associated with the sales order

billingDayOfTheMonth.description: Day of the month that the customer should be invoiced

shipToAddress.description: Address the order is to be shipped to

name.description: Optional display name for the address

addressLine1.description: The first address line can be used by itself for unstructured addresses

addressLine2.description: Optional second line of the address

addressLine3.description: Optional third line of the address

cityName.description: Display name of the city for the address

stateProvinceName.description: Display name of the state or province for the address

stateProvinceCode.description: The ISO region code for the address

countryName.description: Display name of the country for the address

countryCode.description: The ISO country code for the address

postalCodeText.description: The postal code for the address

geoAccuracyCode.description: Provides more information about the latitude and longitude of the address

shipToEmailAddress.description: Email address of ship to contact

confirmationRecipientEmailText.description: List of email addresses to be messaged for order confirmation

isAlerted.description: True if user was notified that something went wrong during a workflow, false otherwise

isAnonymous.description: True if the sales order was placed by an unregistered guest user, false otherwise

isBillNow.description: True if the customer is eligible to be billed now, false otherwise

isClosed.description: True if the sales order is closed, false otherwise

isContracted.description: True if the sales order was placed under the terms of a contract, false otherwise

isHistoricalOnly.description: True if the sales order is historical, false otherweise

isSuspended.description: True if the order is suspended, false otherwise

isTaxExempt.description: True if taxes apply to the sales order, false otherwise

priceCalculationStatusMessageText.description: Text that describes the state of the price calculation process for the order

renewalTerm.description: For renewal orders, the length of the renewal term

renewalUpliftRate.description: For renewal orders, the percentage of increase or decrease in order quantity

paidAmount.description: Represents the paid amount (full or partial) by the customer

totalBookingAmount.description: Total amount of Sales Order Product Booking amounts

totalCancelledBillingAmount.description: Total of all canceled order products

totalPendingBillingAmount.description: Total pending for all order products

totalDeliveryAmount.description: Sum of order-level and delivery fee amounts, but excluding taxes

totalDeliveryTaxAmount.description: Roll up of delivery charge tax amounts

totalDeliveryAdjustmentAmount.description: Total of all order-level price adjustments of type Delivery

totalDeliveryAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Roll up of delivery charge adjustment tax amounts in the sales order delivery group

totalDeliveryDistributedAdjustmentAmount.description: Total of all order-level distributed price adjustments of type Delivery

totalDeliveryDistributedAdjustmentTaxAmo.description: Roll up of delivery charge distributed adjustment tax amounts in the sales order delivery group

totalProductAmount.description: Total price of the products on the fulfillment order

totalProductTaxAmount.description: Tax on the total product amount

totalProductAdjustmentAmount.description: Roll up of all order line-item level price adjustments, excluding taxes

totalProductAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Roll up of all order price adjustments taxes

totalProductDistributedAdjustmentAmount.description: Total of all order-level distributed price adjustments of type product

totalProductDistributedAdjustmentTaxAmou.description: Roll up of distributed adjustment tax amounts of type product

totalAmount.description: Total, including adjustments but not tax, of all product and delivery amounts

totalTaxAmount.description: Total of all product and delivery tax amounts

salesOrderProducts.description: Line items for the sales order, which can be a list of identifier references or complete objects (not both)

externalIds.description: External identifiers associated with the entity

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

SalesOrderProduct.description: A component of a sales order that identifies a product or service that will be sold to the customer

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Represents the name of the sales order product record

description.description: Longer description of the sales order product

orderProductNumber.description: Automatically-generated number that identifies the order product

originalOrderProductId.description: For reduction orders, references the original order product being reduced

salesOrderProductType.description: Classifies the order product as either a charge or an actual product

salesOrderProductStatus.description: Status of the product within the order, such as Placed or Activated

productId.description: References the underlying product associated with the sales order product

productCode.description: Code of the underlying product associated with the sales order product

sellerId.description: References the seller account assigned to the order product

salesOrderDeliveryGroup.description: Sales order delivery group associated with the order product

requestedStartDate.description: Date when the product or service provisioning was requested to begin

requestedEndDate.description: Date when the product or service provisioning was requested to end

promisedDate.description: Promised start date for the order product

provisioningDate.description: Date when the seller expects to provision the service or product

isAutomaticallyRenewed.description: True for a subscription-type product that can be automatically renewed, false otherwise

isBonusProduct.description: True if the product is a free bonus product, false otherwise

bonusProductReasonType.description: Represents the reason that led to a bonus part being added to the order

isBundleRoot.description: True if the product represents the root level of a bundled product

isGift.description: True if product is a gift, false otherwise

giftRecipientTelephoneNumber.description: Telephone number of the gift recipient

isListedProduct.description: True if product exists on an authorization list and sold to a specific customer, false otherwise

isPromotionalProduct.description: True if the product is a promotional product, false otherwise

promotionId.description: References the actual promotion if this is a promotional product

priceBookEntryId.description: References the associated price book entry

segmentIndex.description: Unique segment index for products that use segment pricing

segmentIndexNumber.description: Used for pricing subscriptions where sub-periods are priced differently

orderedQuantity.description: Number of units of the order product

availableQuantity.description: Amount of an order product that is available to be reduced

cancelledQuantity.description: Quantity of items that have been cancelled, not including credited or returned items

returnedQuantity.description: Quantity of items that have been returned

orderedQuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the quantity ordered

allocatedQuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the quantity allocated

subscriptionRenewalMonthQuantity.description: Determines how often a new order is placed for subscription products

subscriptionTermUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the subscription term quantity

listPrice.description: List price for one unit of the order product

listPriceQuantityUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the list price when the product is a physical product

listPriceTermUnitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measure for the list price when the product is a subscription with a term

unitPrice.description: What the customer is paying for one unit of the product (overrides the standard list price)

recurringPrice.description: A charge that will be incurred by the buyer on a repeating basis

lineAdjustmentSubTotalAmount.description: Calculated as unit price total less total line adjustment amount

lineAdjustmentSubTotalWithTaxAmount.description: Sum of line adjustment sub-total plus tax

orderAdjustmentSubTotalAmount.description: Calculated as total unit price amount less total distributed adjustment amount

totalLineAmount.description: Provides a way to override the standard calculation of the total price amount

totalRecurringPrice.description: For subscription products that have recurring charges, this stores the total of recurring charges when distinct from product charges

totalPrice.description: Calculated as total line amount less adjustments if overridden, otherwise total unit price amount less adjustments

totalProductTaxAmount.description: Sum of all related tax amount records, excluding taxes on adjustments

totalDistributedAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Total tax on distributed adjustment amounts

totalLineAdjustmentAmount.description: Total of all line item adjustments

totalAdjustmentAmount.description: Sum of all adjustments on the order product

totalAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Sum of all taxes on adjustments

totalDeliveryTaxAmount.description: Rollup of sales order product tax entries, where the product is delivery fee, before any adjustments

totalDeliveryAdjustedTaxAmount.description: Rollup of sales order product tax rows, where the product is delivery fee, after any adjustments

totalWithTaxAmount.description: Total price of the order product, sum of total price + total tax amount

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

SalesChannel.description: Channel used to sell goods, such as a Web Store, Retail Store, or B2B

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

description.description: Longer description of the sales channel

salesChannelType.description: Category of the sales channel, for example retail store, web store, partner, or direct marketing

salesChannelNumber.description: Automatically-generated number that identifies the sales channel

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

ExternalId.description: Defines a structure for referencing an entity in external systems

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

externalId.description: A unique identifier assigned to an entity in another system

externalIdType.description: Identifies the system that owns or otherwise recognizes this unique identifier

status.description: Indicates whether this identifier is currently valid or not

statusLastChangedDate.description: Date and time of the last change in status

SalesOrderDeliveryGroup.description: One or more sales order products that share a common sales order delivery method and shipping address

name.description: Short name of the sales order delivery group

description.description: Longer description of the sales order delivery group

salesOrderDeliveryGroupNumber.description: automatically-generated number that identifies the sales order delivery group

salesOrderDeliveryStatus.description: Status of the sales order delivery group

originalDeliveryGroupId.description: References the original delivery group in change order scenarios

salesOrderId.description: References the sales order for which the delivery group defines the set of products that will be delivered together

deliverToName.description: Name of the person who is the contact for the delivery

deliverToAddress.description: Shipping location address for the delivery contact

name.description: Optional display name for the address

addressLine1.description: The first address line can be used by itself for unstructured addresses

addressLine2.description: Optional second line of the address

addressLine3.description: Optional third line of the address

cityName.description: Display name of the city for the address

stateProvinceName.description: Display name of the state or province for the address

stateProvinceCode.description: The ISO region code for the address

countryName.description: Display name of the country for the address

countryCode.description: The ISO country code for the address

postalCodeText.description: The postal code for the address

geoAccuracyCode.description: Provides more information about the latitude and longitude of the address

orderDeliveryMethod.description: Delivery method for the sales order delivery group

desiredDeliveryDate.description: Date the customer asked the delivery to occur

promisedDeliveryDate.description: Date the seller promises to deliver the group of items

isGift.description: True if delivery is a gift, false otherwise

totalDeliveryAmount.description: Total amount of the delivery charges on the fulfillment order

totalDeliveryTaxAmount.description: Tax on the total delivery amount

totalDeliveryAdjustmentAmount.description: Total amount of the price adjustments applied to the delivery charges

totalDeliveryAdjustmentTaxAmount.description: Tax on the total delivery adjustment amount

totalAmount.description: Adjusted total, not including tax, of the fulfillment order line items, including products and delivery charges

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted

OrderDeliveryMethod.description: Standardized methods for transferring purchased products or services to the destination of fulfillment

id.description: Unique identifier for the entity, can be null on create if auto-generated

name.description: Short name of the sales order delivery method

productId.description: Product that defines the delivery method

supplierCustomerId.description: References the carrier/supplier that the buyer chose for the delivery method

supplierClassOfService.description: Carrier/supplier class of service that the buyer chose for the delivery method

createdDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was created

createdBy.description: Identifies the system or user which created the entity

updatedDate.description: Timestamp of when the entity was last updated

updatedBy.description: Identifies the system or user which last updated the entity

isDeleted.description: Indicates whether or not the entity has been soft-deleted
